A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This Star Wars movie was the laziest in the entire franchise! There wasn't enough time to develop any of the characters further\, or to build up new ones. Rose's personality was rushed in too quickly which made her seem half hatched. I started liking Finn when he was about to sacrifice himself for the greater good of the resistance\, but it was completely ruined by Rose confessing her love that didn't even have time to flourish in the two days that she knew the character. All in all that's how I walked away from the entire film. Phasma and Snoke were also a huge disappointment.
